pullRequest.title: Use system provided light font instead of Roboto-Light
pullRequest.bodyText:
Uses the system provided sans-serif-light font (which by default is Roboto Light) instead of hardcoding our own (outdate) version of Roboto Light.
For most devices everything will look exactly the same, devices using a different system font will look a bit different.
When possible the font family declaration is done in XML. Files touched have their author comments removed and imports optimized.

commit.message: Use system provided light font instead of Roboto-Light
